channel.title: Image Site
channel.description: So, I got a stupid idea to set up my own image site, and went through a big ass thread of funny pictures, saving the best from there. Ended up with 280 pictures and 57 gifs. The thing is, I don't have the slightest of idea about how to set up the site itself. Anyone who has an idea of how to do that, please help the handicap.

item.title: Image Site
item.dc:creator: iKy
item.description:
the internet is not a truck where you dump all those pictures that allready are in it :-??

how about making a simple free hosted website with tons of comercials and host them all on some image hosting site like imageshack or picoodle or photobucket , it saves you moneys !

Read full topic

item.title: Image Site
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
I made a website and stored lots of cool images on it… Check it out, in my sig.

You have two options, either get webhosting (there are alot of cool free ones) or set up a webserver yourself like I did, both can be easy or hard, depending on what you want to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Image Site
item.dc:creator: Coolm4n
item.description:
Imonfire:

Sorry but if you don’t know how to do it, don’t do it. Atleast now. You need to have a very good knowledge of xHTML/CSS (external preferably)/PHP/MySQL.

You will then need a server and pay to get your website hosted.

^This

Read full topic

item.title: Image Site
item.dc:creator: samzala
item.description:
So, I got a stupid idea to set up my own image site, and went through a big ass thread of funny pictures, saving the best from there. Ended up with 280 pictures and 57 gifs. The thing is, I don’t have the slightest of idea about how to set up the site itself. Anyone who has an idea of how to do that, please help the handicap.
